name: CVE-2014-4744
description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in osTicket before 1.9.2 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) Phone Number field to open.php or (2) Phone number field, (3) passwd1 field, (4) passwd2 field, or (5) do parameter to account.php.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6:rc5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6:rc1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6:rc3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.2.7:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6:rc4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.8.1:developer_preview:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.3.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:osticket:osticket:1.6:rc2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0.3:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.1:rc1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0:rc1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.1.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.1.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:enhancesoft:osticket:1.8.0:rc2:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
